name: VZMacAuxiliaryStorage.InitializationOptions
desc: Options you can set when creating new auxiliary storage.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a new initialization options structure with the value you supply.

items.name: static var allowOverwrite: VZMacAuxiliaryStorage.InitializationOptions
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the VM can overwrite an existing auxiliary storage file.
